description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Ever wanted to know just how obsessed with collecting you are? Obsessive Collecting Disorder is a platformer designed to test you to your collecting limits, 70 levels of hardcore collecting action await.... get rated today!
